Peter Raum

Peter Raum – Peter Raum

Hello and welcome to my website. My name is Peter Raum and I'm a PhD student at Virginia Tech studying theoretical and computational quantum many-body physics for strongly correlated systems.

What I am doing right now:

  • Defending my dissertation December 11, 2019.
  • Applying for postdocs.
  • Most recent paper: Two-Particle Correlation Functions in Cluster Perturbation Theory: Hubbard Spin Susceptibilities on the [arXiv].
  • Working on my Lanczos and Noodle code when I can.
